result.reason: Enhancement to add IntelliSense-like autocomplete dropdown for external tool token/variable replacement, improving discoverability of %HOSTNAME%, %PORT% etc. tokens
result.approach: Extract token names from GetVariableReplacement switch into a static list, then enhance the Arguments/Filename/WorkingDir text boxes in ExternalToolsWindow with a popup ListBox that appears when user types %, filtering tokens as they type and inserting the selected token on Enter/click
